member.name: M:Api.Nmma.BundleConfig.RegisterBundles(System.Web.Optimization.BundleCollection)
member.remarks: For more information on Bundling, visit http:\/\/go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=254725

member.name: M:Api.Nmma.ErrorPolicyConfig.RegisterPolicy(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Configures whether error details, such as exception messages and stack traces, should be included in error messages. This configuration uses the customErrors element from the web.config.
member.remarks:
IncludeErrorDetailPolicy: Default: Use the default behavior for the host environment. For ASP.NET hosting, use the value from the customErrors element in the Web.config file. For self-hosting, use the value LocalOnly. LocalOnly: Only include error details when responding to a local request. Always: Always include error details. Never: Never include error details.
customErrors mode: On: Specifies that custom errors are enabled. If no defaultRedirect attribute is specified, users see a generic error. The custom errors are shown to the remote clients and to the local host. Off: Specifies that custom errors are disabled. The detailed ASP.NET errors are shown to the remote clients and to the local host. RemoteOnly: Specifies that custom errors are shown only to the remote clients, and that ASP.NET errors are shown to the local host. This is the default value.

member.name: M:MvcApplication1.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.
